verses.verse: אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> These הַדְּבָרִ֗ים <S%H1697><s%> These [be] the words אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> spake מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> which Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> unto all Israel בְּעֵ֖בֶר <S%H5676><s%> on this side הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan בַּמִּדְבָּ֡ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness בָּֽעֲרָבָה֩ <S%H6160><s%> in the plain מ֨וֹל <S%H4136><s%> over against ס֜וּף <S%H5489><s%> the Red בֵּֽין־ <S%H996><s%> between פָּארָ֧ן <S%H6290><s%> [sea] between Paran וּבֵֽין־ <S%H996><s%> between תֹּ֛פֶל <S%H8603><s%> and Tophel וְלָבָ֥ן <S%H3837><s%> and Laban וַחֲצֵרֹ֖ת <S%H2698><s%> and Hazeroth וְדִ֥י זָהָֽב׃ <S%H1774><s%> and Dizahab

אַחַ֨ד <S%H259><s%> a עָשָׂ֥ר <S%H6240><s%> ten יוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> days' מֵֽחֹרֵ֔ב <S%H2722><s%> [journey] from Horeb דֶּ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> of mount שֵׂעִ֑יר <S%H8165><s%> Seir עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against קָדֵ֥שׁ בַּרְנֵֽעַ׃ <S%H6947><s%> to Kadesh-barnea

וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> become בְּאַרְבָּעִ֣ים <S%H705><s%> And it came to pass in the fortieth שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> year בְּעַשְׁתֵּֽי־ <S%H6249><s%> eleven עָשָׂ֥ר <S%H6240><s%> ten חֹ֖דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month בְּאֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> on the first לַחֹ֑דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> [day] of the month דִּבֶּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> spake מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> [that] Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כְּ֠כֹל <S%H3605><s%> to all אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֧ה <S%H6680><s%> had given him in commandment יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> according unto all that the LORD אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> אֲלֵהֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> about

אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> After הַכֹּת֗וֹ <S%H5221><s%> he had slain אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> סִיחֹן֙ <S%H5511><s%> Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> which dwelt בְּחֶשְׁבּ֑וֹן <S%H2809><s%> in Heshbon וְאֵ֗ת <S%H853><s%> ע֚וֹג <S%H5747><s%> and Og מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king הַבָּשָׁ֔ן <S%H1316><s%> of Bashan אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יוֹשֵׁ֥ב <S%H3427><s%> which dwelt בְּעַשְׁתָּרֹ֖ת <S%H6252><s%> at Astaroth בְּאֶדְרֶֽעִי׃ <S%H154><s%> in Edrei

בְּעֵ֥בֶר <S%H5676><s%> On this side הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מוֹאָ֑ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab הוֹאִ֣יל <S%H2974><s%> began מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses בֵּאֵ֛ר <S%H874><s%> to declare אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתּוֹרָ֥ה <S%H8451><s%> this law הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֛ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake אֵלֵ֖ינוּ <S%H413><s%> to us בְּחֹרֵ֣ב <S%H2722><s%> unto us in Horeb לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying רַב־ <S%H7227><s%> long enough לָכֶ֥ם שֶׁ֖בֶת <S%H3427><s%> Ye have dwelt בָּהָ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> in this mount הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

פְּנ֣וּ ׀ <S%H6437><s%> Turn וּסְע֣וּ <S%H5265><s%> you and take your journey לָכֶ֗ם וּבֹ֨אוּ <S%H935><s%> and go הַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> to the mount הָֽאֱמֹרִי֮ <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שְׁכֵנָיו֒ <S%H7934><s%> and unto all [the places] nigh בָּעֲרָבָ֥ה <S%H6160><s%> thereunto in the plain בָהָ֛ר <S%H2022><s%> in the hills וּבַשְּׁפֵלָ֥ה <S%H8219><s%> and in the vale וּבַנֶּ֖גֶב <S%H5045><s%> and in the south וּבְח֣וֹף <S%H2348><s%> side הַיָּ֑ם <S%H3220><s%> and by the sea אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> to the land הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <S%H3669><s%> of the Canaanites וְהַלְּבָנ֔וֹן <S%H3844><s%> and unto Lebanon עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far הַנָּהָ֥ר <S%H5104><s%> river הַגָּדֹ֖ל <S%H1419><s%> unto the great נְהַר־ <S%H5104><s%> the river פְּרָֽת׃ <S%H6578><s%> Euphrates

רְאֵ֛ה <S%H7200><s%> Behold נָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> I have set לִפְנֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H6440><s%> before אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land בֹּ֚אוּ <S%H935><s%> you go וּרְשׁ֣וּ <S%H3423><s%> in and possess אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֣ע <S%H7650><s%> sware יְ֠הוָה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD לַאֲבֹ֨תֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H1><s%> unto your fathers לְאַבְרָהָ֨ם <S%H85><s%> Abraham לְיִצְחָ֤ק <S%H3327><s%> Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> and Jacob לָתֵ֣ת <S%H5414><s%> to give לָהֶ֔ם וּלְזַרְעָ֖ם <S%H2233><s%> unto them and to their seed אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H310><s%> after

וָאֹמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> And I spake אֲלֵכֶ֔ם <S%H413><s%> to you בָּעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> unto you at that time הַהִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> he לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> I am not אוּכַ֥ל <S%H3201><s%> I am not able לְבַדִּ֖י <S%H905><s%> you myself alone שְׂאֵ֥ת <S%H5375><s%> to bear אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <S%H853><s%>

יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H430><s%> your God הִרְבָּ֣ה <S%H7235><s%> hath multiplied אֶתְכֶ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וְהִנְּכֶ֣ם <S%H2009><s%> and behold הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> you and behold ye [are] this day כְּכוֹכְבֵ֥י <S%H3556><s%> as the stars הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven לָרֹֽב׃ <S%H7230><s%> for multitude

יְהוָ֞ה <S%H3068><s%> (The LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God אֲבֽוֹתֵכֶ֗ם <S%H1><s%> of your fathers יֹסֵ֧ף <S%H3254><s%> so many more as עֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H5921><s%> and כָּכֶ֖ם אֶ֣לֶף <S%H505><s%> make you a thousand פְּעָמִ֑ים <S%H6471><s%> times וִיבָרֵ֣ךְ <S%H1288><s%> ye [are] and bless אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> he דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> you as he hath promised לָכֶֽם׃

אֵיכָ֥ה <S%H349><s%> How אֶשָּׂ֖א <S%H5375><s%> can I myself alone bear לְבַדִּ֑י <S%H905><s%> alone טָרְחֲכֶ֥ם <S%H2960><s%> your cumbrance וּמַֽשַּׂאֲכֶ֖ם <S%H4853><s%> and your burden וְרִֽיבְכֶֽם׃ <S%H7379><s%> adversary

הָב֣וּ <S%H3051><s%> Take לָ֠כֶם אֲנָשִׁ֨ים <S%H582><s%> men חֲכָמִ֧ים <S%H2450><s%> you wise וּנְבֹנִ֛ים <S%H995><s%> and understanding וִידֻעִ֖ים <S%H3045><s%> and known לְשִׁבְטֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H7626><s%> among your tribes וַאֲשִׂימֵ֖ם <S%H7760><s%> and I will make בְּרָאשֵׁיכֶֽם׃ <S%H7218><s%> them rulers

וַֽתַּעֲנ֖וּ <S%H6030><s%> And ye answered אֹתִ֑י <S%H853><s%> וַתֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> me and said טֽוֹב־ <S%H2896><s%> [is] good הַדָּבָ֥ר <S%H1697><s%> The thing אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which דִּבַּ֖רְתָּ <S%H1696><s%> which thou hast spoken לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <S%H6213><s%> [for us] to do

וָאֶקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> So I took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> the chief שִׁבְטֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H7626><s%> of your tribes אֲנָשִׁ֤ים <S%H376><s%> men חֲכָמִים֙ <S%H2450><s%> wise וִֽידֻעִ֔ים <S%H3045><s%> and known וָאֶתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> and made אֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> רָאשִׁ֖ים <S%H7218><s%> them heads עֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H5921><s%> over שָׂרֵ֨י <S%H8269><s%> over you captains אֲלָפִ֜ים <S%H505><s%> over thousands וְשָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> and captains מֵא֗וֹת <S%H3967><s%> over hundreds וְשָׂרֵ֤י <S%H8269><s%> and captains חֲמִשִּׁים֙ <S%H2572><s%> over fifties וְשָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> and captains עֲשָׂרֹ֔ת <S%H6235><s%> over tens וְשֹׁטְרִ֖ים <S%H7860><s%> and officers לְשִׁבְטֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H7626><s%> among your tribes

וָאֲצַוֶּה֙ <S%H6680><s%> And I charged אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֹׁ֣פְטֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H8199><s%> your judges בָּעֵ֥ת <S%H6256><s%> at that time הַהִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> he לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying שָׁמֹ֤עַ <S%H8085><s%> Hear בֵּין־ <S%H996><s%> between אֲחֵיכֶם֙ <S%H251><s%> [the causes] between your brethren וּשְׁפַטְתֶּ֣ם <S%H8199><s%> and judge צֶ֔דֶק <S%H6664><s%> righteously בֵּֽין־ <S%H996><s%> between אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> between [every] man וּבֵין־ <S%H996><s%> between אָחִ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brother וּבֵ֥ין <S%H996><s%> between גֵּרֽוֹ׃ <S%H1616><s%> and the stranger

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תַכִּ֨ירוּ <S%H5234><s%> Ye shall not respect פָנִ֜ים <S%H6440><s%> persons בַּמִּשְׁפָּ֗ט <S%H4941><s%> in judgment כַּקָּטֹ֤ן <S%H6996><s%> the small כַּגָּדֹל֙ <S%H1419><s%> as well as the great תִּשְׁמָע֔וּן <S%H8085><s%> [but] ye shall hear לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> shall not תָג֙וּרוּ֙ <S%H1481><s%> ye shall not be afraid מִפְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> of the face אִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of man כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for הַמִּשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> for the judgment לֵאלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> [is] God's ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְהַדָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> and the cause אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after יִקְשֶׁ֣ה <S%H7185><s%> that is too hard מִכֶּ֔ם <S%H4480><s%> is too תַּקְרִב֥וּן <S%H7126><s%> for you bring אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> to me וּשְׁמַעְתִּֽיו׃ <S%H8085><s%> [it] unto me and I will hear

וָאֲצַוֶּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> And I commanded אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> you at that time הַהִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> he אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> all the things אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> you תַּעֲשֽׂוּן׃ <S%H6213><s%> which ye should do

וַנִּסַּ֣ע <S%H5265><s%> And when we departed מֵחֹרֵ֗ב <S%H2722><s%> from Horeb וַנֵּ֡לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> and went אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמִּדְבָּ֣ר <S%H4057><s%> wilderness הַגָּדוֹל֩ <S%H1419><s%> all that great וְהַנּוֹרָ֨א <S%H3372><s%> and terrible הַה֜וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which רְאִיתֶ֗ם <S%H7200><s%> which ye saw דֶּ֚רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> of the mountain הָֽאֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֛ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God אֹתָ֑נוּ <S%H853><s%> וַנָּבֹ֕א <S%H935><s%> us and we came עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against קָדֵ֥שׁ בַּרְנֵֽעַ׃ <S%H6947><s%> to Kadeshbarnea

וָאֹמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> And I said אֲלֵכֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> to you בָּאתֶם֙ <S%H935><s%> unto you Ye are come עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> unto the mountain הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> doth give לָֽנוּ׃

רְ֠אֵה <S%H7200><s%> Behold נָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> hath set יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God לְפָנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land עֲלֵ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> thee go up רֵ֗שׁ <S%H3423><s%> [and] possess כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> hath said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> [it] as the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> God אֲבֹתֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H1><s%> of thy fathers לָ֔ךְ אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּירָ֖א <S%H3372><s%> unto thee fear וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תֵּחָֽת׃ <S%H2865><s%> not neither be discouraged

וַתִּקְרְב֣וּן <S%H7126><s%> And ye came near אֵלַי֮ <S%H413><s%> then כֻּלְּכֶם֒ <S%H3605><s%> all וַתֹּאמְר֗וּ <S%H559><s%> unto me every one of you and said נִשְׁלְחָ֤ה <S%H7971><s%> We will send אֲנָשִׁים֙ <S%H376><s%> men לְפָנֵ֔ינוּ <S%H6440><s%> before וְיַחְפְּרוּ־ <S%H2658><s%> us and they shall search us out לָ֖נוּ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land וְיָשִׁ֤בוּ <S%H7725><s%> again אֹתָ֙נוּ֙ <S%H853><s%> דָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> us word אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> by what way אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which נַעֲלֶה־ <S%H5927><s%> we must go up בָּ֔הּ וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> הֶֽעָרִ֔ים <S%H5892><s%> and into what cities אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נָבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> we shall come אֲלֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַיִּיטַ֥ב <S%H3190><s%> be accepted בְּעֵינַ֖י <S%H5869><s%> affliction הַדָּבָ֑ר <S%H1697><s%> And the saying וָאֶקַּ֤ח <S%H3947><s%> and I took מִכֶּם֙ <S%H4480><s%> at שְׁנֵ֣ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָׂ֣ר <S%H6240><s%> ten אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H582><s%> men אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of your men אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> of you one לַשָּֽׁבֶט׃ <S%H7626><s%> tribe

וַיִּפְנוּ֙ <S%H6437><s%> And they turned וַיַּעֲל֣וּ <S%H5927><s%> and went up הָהָ֔רָה <S%H2022><s%> into the mountain וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> and came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against נַ֣חַל <S%H5158><s%> unto the valley אֶשְׁכֹּ֑ל <S%H812><s%> of Eshcol וַֽיְרַגְּל֖וּ <S%H7270><s%> and searched it out אֹתָֽהּ׃ <S%H853><s%>

וַיִּקְח֤וּ <S%H3947><s%> And they took בְיָדָם֙ <S%H3027><s%> in their hands מִפְּרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> of the fruit הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land וַיּוֹרִ֖דוּ <S%H3381><s%> and brought [it] down אֵלֵ֑ינוּ <S%H413><s%> to us וַיָּשִׁ֨בוּ <S%H7725><s%> again אֹתָ֤נוּ <S%H853><s%> דָבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> us word וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> and said טוֹבָ֣ה <S%H2896><s%> [It is] a good הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֖ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God נֹתֵ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> doth give לָֽנוּ׃

וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> were not אֲבִיתֶ֖ם <S%H14><s%> Notwithstanding ye would לַעֲלֹ֑ת <S%H5927><s%> not go up וַתַּמְר֕וּ <S%H4784><s%> but rebelled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> against the commandment יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God

וַתֵּרָגְנ֤וּ <S%H7279><s%> And ye murmured בְאָהֳלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H168><s%> in your tents וַתֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> and said בְּשִׂנְאַ֤ת <S%H8130><s%> enemy יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Because the LORD אֹתָ֔נוּ <S%H853><s%> הוֹצִיאָ֖נוּ <S%H3318><s%> us he hath brought us forth מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> to deliver אֹתָ֛נוּ <S%H853><s%> בְּיַ֥ד <S%H3027><s%> us into the hand הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites לְהַשְׁמִידֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H8045><s%> to destroy

אָנָ֣ה ׀ <S%H575><s%> Where אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we עֹלִ֗ים <S%H5927><s%> Whither shall we go up אַחֵינוּ֩ <S%H251><s%> ? our brethren הֵמַ֨סּוּ <S%H4549><s%> have discouraged אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לְבָבֵ֜נוּ <S%H3824><s%> our heart לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> The people גָּד֤וֹל <S%H1419><s%> [is] greater וָרָם֙ <S%H7311><s%> and taller מִמֶּ֔נּוּ <S%H4480><s%> than עָרִ֛ים <S%H5892><s%> than we the cities גְּדֹלֹ֥ת <S%H1419><s%> [are] great וּבְצוּרֹ֖ת <S%H1219><s%> and walled up בַּשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> to heaven וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> and besides בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the sons עֲנָקִ֖ים <S%H6062><s%> of the Anakims רָאִ֥ינוּ <S%H7200><s%> and moreover we have seen שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> in it

וָאֹמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> Then I said אֲלֵכֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> about לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תַֽעַרְצ֥וּן <S%H6206><s%> unto you Dread וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תִֽירְא֖וּן <S%H3372><s%> not neither be afraid מֵהֶֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> like

וּבַמִּדְבָּר֙ <S%H4057><s%> And in the wilderness אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> where רָאִ֔יתָ <S%H7200><s%> where thou hast seen אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> how נְשָׂאֲךָ֙ <S%H5375><s%> bare יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> how that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יִשָּׂא־ <S%H5375><s%> doth bear אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> thee as a man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנ֑וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> in all the way אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הֲלַכְתֶּ֔ם <S%H1980><s%> that ye went עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בֹּאֲכֶ֖ם <S%H935><s%> until ye came עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הַמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> into this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this

וּבַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> Yet in this thing הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this אֵֽינְכֶם֙ <S%H369><s%> did not מַאֲמִינִ֔ם <S%H539><s%> ye did not believe בַּיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo יִרְאֶ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> see אִישׁ֙ <S%H376><s%> Surely there shall not one בָּאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <S%H376><s%> men הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> of these הַדּ֥וֹר <S%H1755><s%> generation הָרָ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> of this evil הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land הַטּוֹבָ֔ה <S%H2896><s%> that good אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which נִשְׁבַּ֔עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> which I sware לָתֵ֖ת <S%H5414><s%> to give לַאֲבֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> unto your fathers

זֽוּלָתִ֞י <S%H2108><s%> Save כָּלֵ֤ב <S%H3612><s%> Caleb בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְפֻנֶּה֙ <S%H3312><s%> of Jephunneh ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִרְאֶ֔נָּה <S%H7200><s%> he shall see וְלֽוֹ־ אֶתֵּ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> it and to him will I give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that דָּֽרַךְ־ <S%H1869><s%> he hath trodden upon בָּ֖הּ וּלְבָנָ֑יו <S%H1121><s%> and to his children יַ֕עַן <S%H3282><s%> on אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which מִלֵּ֖א <S%H4390><s%> because he hath wholly אַחֲרֵ֥י <S%H310><s%> followed יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also בִּי֙ הִתְאַנַּ֣ף <S%H599><s%> was angry יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Also the LORD בִּגְלַלְכֶ֖ם <S%H1558><s%> with me for your sakes לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> even אַתָּ֖ה <S%H859><s%> you לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תָבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> Thou also shalt not go שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> in thither

יְהוֹשֻׁ֤עַ <S%H3091><s%> [But] Joshua בִּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נוּן֙ <S%H5126><s%> of Nun הָעֹמֵ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> which standeth לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <S%H6440><s%> before ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יָ֣בֹא <S%H935><s%> thee he shall go in שָׁ֑מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there אֹת֣וֹ <S%H853><s%> חַזֵּ֔ק <S%H2388><s%> thither encourage כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יַנְחִלֶ֥נָּה <S%H5157><s%> to inherit אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> him for he shall cause Israel

וְטַפְּכֶם֩ <S%H2945><s%> Moreover your little ones אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who אֲמַרְתֶּ֜ם <S%H559><s%> which ye said לָבַ֣ז <S%H957><s%> should be a prey יִהְיֶ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> become וּ֠בְנֵיכֶם <S%H1121><s%> and your children אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no יָדְע֤וּ <S%H3045><s%> had no knowledge הַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> which in that day ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> between good וָרָ֔ע <S%H7451><s%> and evil הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like יָבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> they shall go in שָׁ֑מָּה <S%H8033><s%> there וְלָהֶ֣ם אֶתְּנֶ֔נָּה <S%H5414><s%> thither and unto them will I give וְהֵ֖ם <S%H1992><s%> and they יִירָשֽׁוּהָ׃ <S%H3423><s%> it and they shall possess

וְאַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> you פְּנ֣וּ <S%H6437><s%> But [as for] you turn לָכֶ֑ם וּסְע֥וּ <S%H5265><s%> you and take your journey הַמִּדְבָּ֖רָה <S%H4057><s%> into the wilderness דֶּ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> by the way יַם־ <S%H3220><s%> sea סֽוּף׃ <S%H5488><s%> of the Red

וַֽתַּעֲנ֣וּ ׀ <S%H6030><s%> Then ye answered וַתֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> to me חָטָאנוּ֮ <S%H2398><s%> unto me We have sinned לַֽיהוָה֒ <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD אֲנַ֤חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> we נַעֲלֶה֙ <S%H5927><s%> we will go up וְנִלְחַ֔מְנוּ <S%H3898><s%> and fight כְּכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֖נוּ <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> according to all that the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God וַֽתַּחְגְּר֗וּ <S%H2296><s%> us And when ye had girded אִ֚ישׁ <S%H376><s%> on every man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> his weapons מִלְחַמְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4421><s%> of war וַתָּהִ֖ינוּ <S%H1951><s%> ye were ready לַעֲלֹ֥ת <S%H5927><s%> to go up הָהָֽרָה׃ <S%H2022><s%> into the hill

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> to me אֱמֹ֤ר <S%H559><s%> unto me Say לָהֶם֙ לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> nor תַֽעֲלוּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> unto them Go not up וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> otherwise תִלָּ֣חֲמ֔וּ <S%H3898><s%> neither fight כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אֵינֶ֖נִּי <S%H369><s%> for בְּקִרְבְּכֶ֑ם <S%H7130><s%> for I [am] not among וְלֹא֙ <S%H3808><s%> otherwise תִּנָּֽגְפ֔וּ <S%H5062><s%> you lest ye be smitten לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before אֹיְבֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H341><s%> your enemies

וָאֲדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> So I spake אֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> about וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֑ם <S%H8085><s%> unto you and ye would not hear וַתַּמְרוּ֙ <S%H4784><s%> but rebelled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> against the commandment יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַתָּזִ֖דוּ <S%H2102><s%> presumptuously וַתַּעֲל֥וּ <S%H5927><s%> up הָהָֽרָה׃ <S%H2022><s%> into the hill

וַיֵּצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> came out הָאֱמֹרִ֜י <S%H567><s%> And the Amorites הַיֹּשֵׁ֨ב <S%H3427><s%> which dwelt בָּהָ֤ר <S%H2022><s%> in that mountain הַהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he לִקְרַאתְכֶ֔ם <S%H7125><s%> against וַיִּרְדְּפ֣וּ <S%H7291><s%> you and chased אֶתְכֶ֔ם <S%H853><s%> כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after תַּעֲשֶׂ֖ינָה <S%H6213><s%> do הַדְּבֹרִ֑ים <S%H1682><s%> you as bees וַֽיַּכְּת֥וּ <S%H3807><s%> and destroyed אֶתְכֶ֛ם <S%H853><s%> בְּשֵׂעִ֖יר <S%H8165><s%> you in Seir עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against חָרְמָֽה׃ <S%H2767><s%> [even] unto Hormah

וַתָּשֻׁ֥בוּ <S%H7725><s%> And ye returned וַתִּבְכּ֖וּ <S%H1058><s%> and wept לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor שָׁמַ֤ע <S%H8085><s%> would not hearken יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> but the LORD בְּקֹ֣לְכֶ֔ם <S%H6963><s%> to your voice וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor הֶאֱזִ֖ין <S%H238><s%> nor give ear אֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H413><s%> about

וַתֵּשְׁב֥וּ <S%H3427><s%> So ye abode בְקָדֵ֖שׁ <S%H6946><s%> in Kadesh יָמִ֣ים <S%H3117><s%> days רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> many כַּיָּמִ֖ים <S%H3117><s%> according unto the days אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> you יְשַׁבְתֶּֽם׃ <S%H3427><s%> that ye abode
